Package com.cyc.query Description

Provides the core classes for constructing, specifying, and running Cyc queries. Queries are requests to Cyc to either confirm that something is true, or else to find bindings for open Variables that result in true sentences. They can be asked from different Contexts, and given different resource constraints, using com.cyc.base.inference.InferenceParameters.

Results can be inspected either while a query is running, or after it has finished. QueryListeners can be defined to handle query-related events such as when new answers are found or the query exhausts.

Results can be processed either as QueryAnswers, or as SQL-style com.cyc.query.KBInferenceResultSets.
